name: Handy Monster Smasher
description:
This small game was made in a few hours for LD Jam 48.

Try to defeat evil Smasher Boss! Be careful and watch your steps. Each attack of the Boss destroys floor tiles. Don't fall down! Throw bombs at Boss to defeat it!

Controls:

Move: WASD

Look: Mouse

Throw bomb: Left mouse

Jump: Space

Restart: R

Quit: Esc

Have fun! :)

NOTE: Web version is a bit buggy, feel free to download Windows version.
